label: 四辻殿
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Said to have been situated at Ichijō-Madenokōji, which would place it just north of the Tsuchimikado Mansion. Used as a residence by Shumeimon-in. [一条万里小路　土御門殿　修明門院]
